transcend.6:

SKT_FIRST.name: Fake Meteor
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and heals the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

SKT_BURST_3.effect: +2 turns of Barrier (proportional to target Health)

description: Attacks an enemy, and heals the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000098_1_1]</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Blessing of the Stars
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Triggered Effect)
When an ally uses an attack that targets all enemies, all allies gain <color=#28d9ed>Barrier</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> increase for <color=#28d9ed>1 turns.</color>The amount of the Barrier strength is proportional to the target’s Max Health.
description: (Triggered Effect)\nWhen an ally uses an attack that targets all enemies, all allies gain <color=#28d9ed>Barrier</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> increase for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000098_2_2] turns.</color>The amount of the Barrier strength is proportional to the targetâs Max Health.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Astra Luminous
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Removes all debuffs and heals all allies by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>. Also reduces Skill Cooldowns of all allies excluding the caster by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.
description: Removes all debuffs and heals all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000098_3_2]</color>. Also reduces Skill Cooldowns of all allies excluding the caster by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.

5: -1 turn skill cooldowns on allies except caster

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc:
<color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, grants all allies a <color=#28d9ed>Barrier</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2</color> turns with a chance of <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>. Barrier strength proportional to the target's Health.

<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, heals the ally with the lowest Health by 15%.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, grants all allies a <color=#28d9ed>Barrier</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000098_chain_1_1]</color> turns with a chance of <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000098_chain_1_1]</color>. Barrier strength proportional to the target's Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, heals the ally with the lowest Health by 15%.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
